New Invoice

Product Unit Price Quantity Image Total
{{product.unitPrice * product.quantity}}
Subtotal {{calculateSubtotal()}}
Taxes (19%) {{calculateTaxes()}}
Total {{calculateTotal()}}
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-create-invoice', templateUrl: './create-invoice.component.html', styleUrls: ['./create-invoice.component.css'] }) export class CreateInvoiceComponent { products: Product[] = []; addProduct() { this.products.push({ productName: '', price: 0, quantity: 1, imageUrl: '' }); } calculateSubtotal() { // Implement logic to calculate the subtotal } calculateTaxes() { // Implement logic to calculate taxes } calculateTotal() { // Implement logic to calculate the total } saveInvoice() { // Implement logic to save the invoice } } interface Product { productName: string; price: number; quantity: number; imageUrl: string; }
